headline.main: Beef Will Be What's for Dinner for a Long Time, Panelists Say

docs.abstract: Panelists at New York University said beef is too great an icon to lose its place in the American diet.
docs.snippet: Panelists at New York University said beef is too great an icon to lose its place in the American diet.

docs.lead_paragraph: Have you been persuaded that beef is waning on the American plate because it's too destructive to the ecosystem, too hormone-pumped and too corn-fed artery-clogging?

headline.main: Beef Will Be What's for Dinner for a Long Time, Panelists Say

docs.abstract: Panelists at New York University said beef is too great an icon to lose its place in the American diet.
docs.snippet: Panelists at New York University said beef is too great an icon to lose its place in the American diet.

headline.main: Friday Reading: Large Study Finds No Cellphone-Cancer Link

docs.abstract: A large study finds no cellphone-cancer link, a gel cuts women's risk of herpes, Facebook's impact on student grades and other consumer-focused news from The New York Times.
docs.snippet: A large study finds no cellphone-cancer link, a gel cuts women's risk of herpes, Facebook's impact on student grades and other consumer-focused news from The New York Times.

docs.lead_paragraph: A variety of consumer-focused articles appears daily in The New York Times and online in our blogs. Each weekday morning, we gather them together here so you can quickly scan the news that could hit you in your wnallet.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Institute of Medicine proposed a nutrition label to rate foods by stars, with three stars signifying the healthiest product.

headline.seo: A Plan to Rate Nutrition of Food With Stars
headline.main: Label Plan Offered to Rate Food Nutrition
headline.print_headline: Label Plan Offered to Rate Food Nutrition

docs.abstract: Institute of Medicine, in report to federal regulators, calls for simplified food labels on front of packages that would show calorie count and one to three stars indicating how healthy product is.
docs.snippet: The Institute of Medicine proposed a nutrition label to rate foods by stars, with three stars signifying the healthiest product.

docs.lead_paragraph: Inmates have been eating fewer meals since April after officials stopped serving lunch on the weekends as a way to trim $2.8 million in food-service costs.

headline.seo: Texas Reduces Weekend Meals for Prisoners
headline.main: In Bid to Cut Costs at Some Texas Prisons, Lunch Will Not Be Served on Weekends
headline.print_headline: In Bid to Cut Costs at Some Texas Prisons, Lunch Will Not Be Served on Weekends

docs.abstract: Thousands of inmates in the Texas prison system have been eating fewer meals after officials stopped serving lunch on the weekends in some prisons as a way to cut food-service costs.
docs.snippet: Inmates have been eating fewer meals since April after officials stopped serving lunch on the weekends as a way to trim $2.8 million in food-service costs.

docs.lead_paragraph: 8:01 p.m. | Updated Abbott Laboratories said on Wednesday that it would separate next year into two publicly traded companies, one focused on diagnostics and medical devices like heart stents and the other on what it called ''research-based pharmaceuticals,'' like Humira, its blockbuster rheumatoid arthritis drug.

headline.main: Abbott Labs Will Split Into 2 Units

docs.abstract: Abbott Laboratories says it will separate into two publicly traded companies, one focused on diagnostics and medical devices and the other on research-based pharmaceuticals; split appeals to investors who want differing levels of risks and rewards. (M)
